name: expense-tracker-root
description: Root package for Expense Tracker App

scripts.install:apps: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run db:reset --prefix server && npm run dev
scripts.start:fresh: npm run db:setup --prefix server && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install:apps && npm run db:setup --prefix server
scripts.setup:demo: npm install && npm run install:apps && npm run db:reset --prefix server
